data.text: Yatogoligwe Mkulu Nguluwi.
Whaani yoweza kulonga madito ga Mkulu Nguluwi?
Nawatambichizwa wala walingudita hachi,
Ung'humbuche gwa Mkulu Nguluwi mhela houlajila vyoulingunojezwa na wanhu wa hegwe,
leka nhambichizwe hamwe na wahaguligwe wa hegwe,
Natudita gehile, hetwe na wasekulu wa hetwe,
Wasekulu wa hetwe lowawele Misili,
Ila Nguluwi nakawalohola kwa lutogo lwa itagwa lya heye,
Nakaing'hanuchila bahali ya Shamu, naikala,
Nakawalohola kuli moko ga wawazudile,
Mazi ga bahali nagawagubika wang'honyo wa hewo,
Hamba wanhu wa heye nawaukunda ulonzi wa heye,
Ila mhela uchefu hela nawasemwa madito ga Nguluwi,
Nawali wamemile maya ng'hatu ya iwunde kula kuchiwala,
Naye Nguluwi nakawapa chila chowaganile,
Kuli kambi walume nawamonela fihi Musa
Aho ndo misanga najigubuka na kummela Datani,
chiluli nachiwalawila walinguwawinza hewo,
Nawagongomanya ilogota kula Holebu,
nawauleka ukulu wa Nguluwi,
Nawamsemwa Nguluwi yawalohole,
vinduzanduza kuli isi ayo ya Hamu,
Nguluwi nakalonga kowadumya wanhu wa heye,
Hamba nawaibeza yila isi ya kunojeza,
Nawang'ung'uta kuli mihema ja hewo,
Ahyo Nguluwi nakenula moko, nakelaha,
ndowasambalula walelwa wa hemwe hali wanhu wanji,
Hamba nawelumba kumfugamila Baali wa kula Peoli,
Nawamdita Nguluwi yazudile kwa madito ga hewo,
Ila Finehasi nakema hagati kuwatanza,
Mbuli ayo yangukumbuchilwa kwa kutanganika kwa heye,
Nawamzudiza Nguluwi kuli mazi ga Meliba,
Kwa vila nawambelenhuka muhe wa Nguluwi,
Hawawakopole wanhu wa isi zinji,
ila nawehanza na wanhu wanji,
Nawajifugamila jimalukolo ja milungu ja hewo,
Nawawakopola wana wa hewo walume na wadala,
Nawabohola danda ya walihela nongwa,
Ahyo nawaditigwa wakokomoche kwa madito ga hewo,
Lelo ng'halazi ya Mkulu Nguluwi naiwafika wanhu wa heye,
Nakawawika kuli ndole za wanhu wa isi zinji,
Wang'honyo wa hewo nawawabunza,
Mala nyinji Nguluwi nakawalohola wanhu wa heye,
Ila Nguluwi nakahulichiza magazo ga hewo,
Kwa chiwalo cha hewo nakalikumbuchila ilagano lya heye,
Nakawadita wonelwe isungu,
Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa hetwe, utulohole,
Yatogoligwe Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa Isilaeli,
